original_text:
Blessed is the nation whose God is the Lord,
    the people whom he has chosen as his heritage!
korean_text: 여호와를 자기 하나님으로 삼은 나라 곧 하나님의 기업으로 선택된 백성은 복이 있도다

sentences.original_text: Blessed is the nation whose God is the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 여호와이신 그 나라는 복이 있도다

sentences.original_text: the people whom he has chosen as his heritage!
